column1: 254414,Registered Nurse (Community Health),,"Plan programs to address community health issues
column3: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column5: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column9: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column11: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health
column13: Assess individual or community needs for educational or social services
column15: Direct medical science or health care programs
column17: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column19: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column21: Administer anaesthetics or sedatives to control pain
column25: Provide medical care and support for families, including health counselling
column27: Treat acute illnesses, infections or injuries
column29: Plan programs to address community mental wellness needs
column31: Advocate for individual or community needs
column33: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column39: Administer health care or medical treatments
column43: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column45: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
column47: Prepare medical supplies or equipment for use
column49: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column53: Communicate health and wellness information to the public
column55: Administer blood or other fluids intravenously
column63: Plan community programs or activities for the general public
column65: Collect information about community health needs
